org.xchain.framework.util

Class LexicographicQNameComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.util.LexicographicQNameComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<javax.xml.namespace.QName>

    public class LexicographicQNameComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<javax.xml.namespace.QName>
    This comparator compares QName objects using the string.compareTo function. QNames are compared first by namespace and then by local name. Null QNames, namespaces and local names are considered equal by this comparitor. If the nullFirst flag is set to true, then null values are sorted before non-null values.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble
